******
### Codebook:
******
* `type` <- Prior Distribution Type
    + `disc` <- Discrete
    + `cont` <- Continuous


* Condition: `type` == `disc`:
    + Condition: `discType` <- Discrete distribution type
        + Bernoulli
            + `bern.prop`
        + Binomial
            + `binom.trials`
            + `binom.successes`
        + Poisson
            + `pois.lambda`

* Condition: `type` == `cont`:
    + Condition: `contType` <- Continuous distribution type
        + Normal
            + `norm.mean`
            + `norm.var`
        + Uniform
            + `a`
            + `b`
        + Exponential
            + `expo.rate`
        + Inverse-Gamma
            + `invgam.shape`
            + `invgam.scale`
